## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G17170](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G17170)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>RFC3</u>
- **Gene Name:** REGULATOR OF FATTY-ACID COMPOSITION 3
- **Description:**   Translation elongation factor EF1B/ribosomal protein S6 family protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2086112
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [CS3775]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;altered composition of fatty acids in roots and seeds: increased oleic acid (18:0) and decreased linoleic (18:2) and linolenic (18:3) acids; fatty acid composition in leaves is similar to wt; produces lateral-root-primordium-like structures but does not form mature lateral roots.
